name: Hamsa Pay, Inc.
description: Developer of a cross-border payment platform designed to combine the existing financial system with blockchain technology. The company's platform features a global checkout portal that is built specifically for B2B e-commerce, a dedicated control center for all transactions and can be integrated with various accounting software, enabling businesses to process multi-currency transfers more efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of a cross-border payment platform designed to combine the existing financial system with blockchain technology. The company's platform features a global checkout portal that is built specifically for B2B e-commerce, a dedicated control center for all transactions and can be integrated with various accounting software, enabling businesses to process multi-currency transfers more efficiently.
